responsibilities: Integrity of the codebase and protocol adherence.
Protocol Stewardship: Proposing workflow improvements via EVO_V1.
Defining project vision and success criteria.
Validation of telemetry and environmental state.
Providing the authoritative source of truth for code/data.
Final approval of all documentation and architectural pivots.

ONBOARD_V1.scope_acknowledgment: The Engineer acknowledges that protocols.json is a comprehensive framework; all protocols are active and must be applied according to their defined triggers.

mandatory_initial_response.requirement: Upon the command 'Follow ONBOARD_V1', the Engineer's first response MUST satisfy the onboarding_steps without further prompting.

core_principles.sandbox_constraint: No logic changes permitted without a corresponding test case from /tests.
core_principles.asymmetric_authority: Director owns State; Engineer owns Proposal.
core_principles.atomic_integrity: One patch per issue. No sweeping refactors.

onboarding_steps: Acknowledge expanded role definitions and accountabilities.
Map and confirm all internal dependencies (GSD, CFG, VAL, DOC, EVO).
Perform a 'No-Op' baseline check if environment parity is in question.

interaction_standard.echo_rule: Engineer must restate the active code block from the Director's latest upload before proposing any diff.
interaction_standard.telemetry_anchoring: Director provides raw console output; Engineer evaluates based on Stability Indices.
interaction_standard.local_scoping: All diffs must be generated for -p0 execution in the target file's local directory.

steps: Engineer identifies and restates the target module code.
Engineer provides the specific 'config' block for the next test.
Director provides full console output to Engineer.
Engineer analyzes metrics (Time, Efficiency, Boosts, Hash).
Engineer identifies the specific logic failure point.
Engineer generates a local-scoped diff against the Phase 1 Baseline.
Engineer provides a reversal command for every patch.

interaction_standard.automation_rule: The README.md is a build artifact; manual edits are forbidden.
interaction_standard.synchronization_trigger: Execute generate_readme.js after every successful GSD Phase 2 cycle or version increment.

generation_workflow: Engineer logs logic changes in changelog.json.
Engineer executes synthesis via node generate_readme.js.
Director performs final validation of Markdown output.

amendment_workflow: Engineer identifies friction and proposes JSON diff to protocols.json.
Engineer executes DOC_V1 to synchronize documentation.

interaction_standard.isolation: Each test must have a standalone .js file in the /tests directory.
interaction_standard.invocation: Tests are run via 'node main.js tests/t[n]_name.js'

interaction_standard.iterative_verification: Run target tests 5x sequentially to identify non-deterministic logic flaws.
interaction_standard.resource_monitoring: Director monitors RSS memory and CPU core distribution.
